title: Kukyo Saxophone Neck Strap Professional Saxophone Harness Leather Padded Soft Neck Sling For Baritone Alto Tenor Soprano,Good for serious saxophone player. gift
features: The design is durable and long lasting, with a plastic hook suitable for more vintage saxophones.The leather neck padding was made by double leather(front and back) ,is very comfortable and stylish.

Handmade saxophone strap follow the traditional minimal design of a neckstrap,Best for alto saxophone and tenor saxophone, the leather neck strap offers a great deal of comfort, and is built wider than most straps to distribute weight over a wider area.

The closed hook provides that added security and so is much more suited to players that move around or want that extra peace of mind. The metal hook is coated with plastic , so you have all the build quality and durability of a metal clasp, without the potential damage to your horn. "
Distributing the weight of the saxophone largely across the neck, the spine itself is completely avoided, which makes both a very comfortable fit and a reduced chance of any health problems arising.
The string is actually paracord, and the build quality is among the best we’ve seen of all straps, leading to a metal fully closed hook.
description: KUKYO saxophone neck strap was designed by professional designer and made by serious craftsman, it was verified by professional saxophone player, could save you from a whole host of problems, including some serious back ache further down the line. If switching between alto and tenor it can rest a little uncomfortably high, however we’re sure you’ll be able to find a happy medium between the two with a little adjustment. It isn’t recommended to be used with a curved soprano. Though initially designed for saxophones, the same strap can also be used for Oboe, English horns, Bassoons and Clarinets. Strap Size: Neck Strap Padded Width Is 1.77", thickness: 0.16" Adjustable 18.11"–22.83" Material: double breathable leather (front and back)
